column1: Tekkali Assembly constituency is a constituency in Srikakulam district of Andhra Pradesh. It is one of the seven assembly segments of Srikakulam (Lok Sabha constituency)
column6: Amadalavalasa and Narasannapeta. As of 25 March 2019
column8: 222 electors in the constituency. In 2019 state assembly election
column9: Atchannaidu Kinjarapu was elected as an MLA of the constituency
